ingredients.ingredient: 6 boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and diced
1 teaspoon salt-free herb and spice blend

cookingTips: Dice cooked chicken into uniform bite-sized pieces for even texture distribution
Chill the salad for at least 30 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld
Adjust mayonnaise quantity based on desired creaminess - start with less and add as needed
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This classic recipe is minimal - would you like suggestions for flavor variations, or do you prefer keeping it simple?
